exceptions.tactic: intros X Y f T1 T2 x.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce Intersection to an evaluable reference.

In environment X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y T1, T2 : Ensemble Y X1 : (Y -> Y) -> Ensemble Y -> Ensemble Y Unable to unify "Intersection (inverse_image f T1) (inverse_image f T2)" with "inverse_image f (Intersection T1 T2)".
The reference H was not found in the current environment.

In environment X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y T1, T2 : Ensemble Y X2 : (Y -> Y) -> Ensemble Y -> Ensemble Y X1 : Ensemble Y Unable to unify "Intersection (inverse_image f T1) (inverse_image f T2)" with "inverse_image f (Intersection T1 T2)".
The reference x' was not found in the current environment.

In environment X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y T1, T2, X1 : Ensemble Y X3 : (Y -> Y) -> Ensemble Y -> Ensemble Y X2 : Ensemble Y Unable to unify "Intersection (inverse_image f T1) (inverse_image f T2)" with "inverse_image f (Intersection T1 T2)".
The reference x' was not found in the current environment.

In environment X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y T1, T2, X1, X2 : Ensemble Y X4 : (Y -> Y) -> Ensemble Y -> Ensemble Y X3 : Ensemble Y Unable to unify "Intersection (inverse_image f T1) (inverse_image f T2)" with "inverse_image f (Intersection T1 T2)".
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.
The reference x'' was not found in the current environment.

In environment X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y T1, T2, X1, X2, X3 : Ensemble Y X5 : (Y -> Y) -> Ensemble Y -> Ensemble Y X4 : Ensemble Y Unable to unify "Intersection (inverse_image f T1) (inverse_image f T2)" with "inverse_image f (Intersection T1 T2)".

original: intros X Y f T1 T2 x. unfold inverse_image, Intersection. split. - intros H. destruct H as [x' [H1 H2]]. split. + exists x'. split; auto. + exists x'. split; auto. - intros [H1 H2]. destruct H1 as [x' [H1 H2]]. destruct H2 as [x'' [H3 H4]]. exists x''. split; split; auto.
